      • setOutputWire

        public void setOutputWire(int outputNum,
                          BasicPart InputPart,
                          int inputNum)
        Creates a new wire instance and passes the arguments to the constructor plus this.
        Parameters:
        outputNum - Node number where the wire originates
        InputPart - The BasePart that the wire is connecting to
        inputNum - Node number where the wire is going to

      • setOutputWireUnknown

        public Wire setOutputWireUnknown(int outputNum)
        Creates a new wire instance and passes the arguments to the constructor plus this.

        For creating a wire instance when the target BasePart is not yet determined

        Parameters:
        outputNum -
        Returns:
        A reference to the wire instance created
